name: XppUpdateModelVersion
description: Task to update X++ model versions for Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations
author: Microsoft Corporation
helpMarkDown: Review the Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations [Developer Documentation](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2128587).

inputs.name: XppSourcePath
inputs.label: X++ Source Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: On a VM this will be the PackagesLocalDirectory, on hosted agents this should be the path where the compiler NuGet was installed

inputs.name: XppDescriptorSearch
inputs.label: Descriptor Search Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Search pattern for the descriptors to update in the source location. Wildcards can be used, or a list of descriptor files by specifying one path per line.

inputs.name: XppLayer
inputs.label: Lowest Layer to Update
inputs.helpMarkDown: Only models in this layer and above will be updated (default VAR and above)

inputs.name: VersionNumber
inputs.label: Version number in format #.#.#.# to update
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version number in format #.#.#.# to update
